subject: Task Completion: p12-5-health-endpoints
content:
Health endpoints task completed successfully. All three endpoints implemented:

✅ /api/health - Enhanced with memory usage, uptime, version info
✅ /api/ready - Matrix homeserver connectivity check (fixed implementation)
✅ /api/live - Simple liveness probe

SYSTEMIC ISSUE FIXED: Replaced problematic Matrix client import in ready endpoint that was causing build failures. Used HTTP-based connectivity check instead.

Remaining build issue: TypeScript error in lib/matrix/privacy.ts:91 (unrelated to this task).

Commits: 973be9b (initial), 7cb073f (fix)

Ready for verification.
